Reviews.Title: Outstanding Value
Reviews.Author: Timothy L. Wagner "DaddyWags"
Reviews.Content: I have had Samsung digital cameras in the past, and prefer them over most other brands for ease of use.  I purchased this one when our older Samsung was passed on to our son.Price the price on this is fantastic. Compared to other cameras, even other Samsungs, with the same specifications, this is a bargain.SizeSmall and thin. If you want something 'meaty' that you can hold with both hands, this is not the camera for you. It is smaller then a cell phone, and thinner.The benefit of this, though, is that this is the first digital camera I have ever owned that I could put in my pocket. I mean it FITS in a pocket, no bulging or stretching. It even slides into a shirt pocket with only a minimal profile.MenuAs I said earlier, I have always preferred Samsung for its ease of use. Many digital cameras can have a steep learning curve as you wend your way through multiple menus and tools. This camera keeps it simple. There's a 'menu' key and a 'mode' key. Those two keys take you to the most used tools. Simple, concise, and quick. It takes video, and that is a key all by itself that slides between camera and video mode.ToolsAll the ones you would expect are there, including a pretty nifty panaromic capability. It has a nice portrait mode, sepia, landscape, etc. Much like the menu, the various tools are self explainatory and easy to use.QualityIn the end, you want a camera that takes nice pics and video. This camera does that. Pictures are crisp and clear, though you have to be a little careful on the zoom mode at its highest level, but that's true of all cameras. This is the perfect choice for the casual photographer who wants something a little nicer then standard, with better features.OtherThe camera takes a micro-sd card.  This contributes to it's small size.

Reviews.Title: Girls just wanna have fun!
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my 7 year old daughter.  It is stylish, yet rugged enough to take on the demands of my daughter.  It is easy to use and a snap to charge; you just plug in the charge cord on the side of the camera (no battery removal to charge). It charges quickly, which is a plus. My daughter captures her little moments with family and friends, both still shot and video (her favorite of course).  I highly recommend this product, especially for parents looking for that extra little something for their active, creative, and imaginative child.

Reviews.Title: Very neat and sleek camera
Reviews.Author: Royalkelly
Reviews.Content: This camera is very neat and sleek.  It fits into many small clutch purses.  There are many features on it.  It captures very good night pics using the Auto feature.  The night mode feature is not that good.  This camera also has good built in memory:  without a memory card, it took approximately 12 pictures.

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear Photos
Reviews.Author: K. Ledbetter
Reviews.Content: For this price, it doesn't get any better. I ordered this because it is Samsung - a brand I trust - it is inexpensive, and it is pink! It is such a cute camera! It is set to automatically adjust lighting for the picture, but you can turn that off. I've tried messing with it a bit and I can see that it has all sorts of settings for taking pictures, even panoramic, which I have not seen in a point-and-shoot camera before. I haven't bothered with them though, since I have not found a need. Zooming is easy, but not necessary. The best part is that it auto-focuses, so there are no blurry photos! One thing to note: It does not come with a memory card for your photos! It caused me a bit of distress after the memory was full from only 13 or so photos. However, you can easily transfer them from the camera to your computer with the adapter chord that it comes with. Just be aware that, using this method, you can only take about 13 photos at a time. For me, it has never been a big deal, but it is something to look into if you take a lot of photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the Price
Reviews.Author: larry morra
Reviews.Content: This was rated well by other customers as being simple and good quality.  I find this camera meets and exceeds those opinions as well as being a fun camera to use.  So easy to keep with me wherever I go, and it got me back to wanting to shoot pictures as I once did quite often when I used to use my 35mm SLR's for family and pleasure photography!  I also worked as a professional photog and with all this exposure to photography I was quite a shutter bug.  I went into other careers and the Industry changed so dramatically during my employment transitions in a short number of years.  I needed to get back to the idea of at least being prepared for those special occasions when you want to capture the moment for future posterity.  Or to just have some fun with photography images that I can adjust and print on my advanced home computer. I must say this camera goes hand in hand with all my current needs and for such a small investment!  I will certainly go to a more advanced camera in the future if my needs become more professional again, but, for now this is doing me a world of good to have the opportunity to just shoot some fun pictures and capture special images or video. One thing some folks may not be aware of is the fact that this and many basic digital cameras don't come with a huge memory capacity.  What I did was to immediately purchase a San Disk micro SDHC 16 GB memory card to boost my shooting capability. Now with that I can shoot stills and videos with my camera without having to worry too soon about downloading the images to my computer or running out of capacity in the middle of some special occasion!  Also, I do have an external hard drive that I can store most of my new photos and videos on, so as not to use up too much space on my computer hard drive.This camera is for sure a great one for folks that are new to digital technology or those that want to keep picture taking simple and convenient.

Reviews.Title: Cheep and quality is eh
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: Thought i would have gotten better picture quality..but this as scratching the average mark. The build quality feels cheep..Build Quality: 5/10Picture: 4.5/10Extras: 6/10ok camera for $70...you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie Pope
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It has so many easy to use features and it is so small it fits in my pocket! The pics are great too and easy to upload.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my collection.
Reviews.Author: Shallin Sidney
Reviews.Content: Came quickly, wonderful features, small size. Couldn't really ask for much more for the price. Samsung did a smashing job. Just kindof wish there was an aperture setting on it, but I have other cameras with that on it. Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: SaraN
Reviews.Content: Was really suprised how nice this camera is.  Small, easy to use and decent picture quality.  Great value for the price!  Videos playback with sound (which my daughter loves)  I got it for her but I prefer grabbing her camera over my own for quick shots!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: The Pink Apron
Reviews.Content: Took this camera all over Greece and Italy. It takes great pictures and it's light enough to carry around in my purse all day. Love the color too....perfect pink.

Reviews.Title: I love this little camera
Reviews.Author: Econ "Ron & Cathy"
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera. It has a long lasting battery and with the added memory, it allows dozens and dozens of snapshots. There is a slight delay when taking a snapshot, but so do most low-cost cameras. It’s easy to use and easy to carry. It takes sharp photos that are perfect for what I needed it to do.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Its cheap, which is nice if you need a decent camera, however with smartphones upping their game on megapixels every few months, its not much better quality. I have the samsung galaxy s4, and the camera on there is comparable. Its a good product, but if you're looking for a super high quality camera, then you'll need to spend more money. overall, i'm happy with it and will definitely use it on vacations, trips, etc.

Reviews.Title: looks nice, works terribly
Reviews.Author: Alberta L Justice
Reviews.Content: twould not advise purchasing this item. came  in time described, but it constantly says, 'file corrupted' when taking pictures. we are always losing pictures. would return, but wife tthrew away box and receipt..

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Danny Marcelo Lobato
Reviews.Content: I did a very good buy, the product meets all my expectations, it is excellent and I recommend everyone to use it.

Reviews.Title: easy point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Digital cameras are so easy to take along.  I like a small, simple camera that can figure out what my picture needs.  I never did like messing with camera settings.  This little camera can slip into your pocket and deliver great shots.  Perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Paul Cardoso
Reviews.Content: I buy a lot of cameras for the collision business. I think Samsung makes a great product and this camera gets a lot of use.Picture is excellent, fits in your pocket and it charges plugged in without removing the battery.Like I said it gets a lot of use and it normally lasts about a year with everyday use, and I do mean a lot of use.I recommend it for the price and quality.

Reviews.Title: Small dimensions, bigger on features
Reviews.Author: Ramses
Reviews.Content: Don't be reluctant to its small dimensions, this tiny camera has a lot of nice features you will love as soon as you turn it on...  panorama, pic-in-pic, nice zoom, 16mpxl  all for a good price.....I highly recommend to buy it... You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: a.willy
Reviews.Content: It takes good pictures, it's light easy to use, and it looks nice. Would make a great gift for just about anybody.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Hello
Reviews.Content: The camera is great , nice flash , but the only problem is that it is very small its about pam size .

Reviews.Title: Great easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: kea
Reviews.Content: Simple to use, easy to figure out, takes nice pictures.  I am very satisfied so far.  Good value for the cost.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight and great!
Reviews.Author: DoubleA
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, it's so tiny and easy to throw in my purse. The pictures are really nice and the panoramic feature, although it is a bit touchy does well. No complaints here.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: SuriKatta
Reviews.Content: I was upgrading from a sony dsc-5 which was about 12 years old. My sony still worked great but compared to most digital cameras today it was 3x the size and 1/5th the mps! I have been looking for awhile for something small that had video, live panorama capabilities, shake stabilizer, smile technology and had several picture options. When I saw this on sale and it took micro sd cards and found the extra batteries would not cost a fortune, I bought it. It is easy to use right out of the box. It is so small but I really like that after my last camera. I don't take a lot of pictures except when I go on vacation so this is perfect for me. It is really easy to use. I also like the fact that I could download the manual and it was easy to understand.  It has all of the features I was looking for. It shoots video at 30fps and at HQ . The videos come out well, the pictures are really nice too. I spent the extra few dollars and got it in pink!

Reviews.Title: P
Reviews.Author: kk
Reviews.Content: I JUST FOUND THAT IT DOESNT TAKE SD CARD AND IT DOES'NT TELLS YOU IN THE AD .THATS VERY VERY BAD.AM SOOOO DESAPPOINTEDAMAZON BE PROFSIONAL

Reviews.Title: Very upset.
Reviews.Author: Wanderer
Reviews.Content: I was very upset with this product. The fact that it uses a micro sd card is very relavent and no where in the ad was it mentioned. I will probably send it back just because of that.

ProductInfo.Features:
Clearer shots in the dark - F2.5 Bright lens
Capture a vision that's clearer and wider - 16 Mega Pixels/5x/25mm
HD movies in the palm of your hand - HD 720p, 30fps, MJPEG
2.7" Intelligent LCD provides improved contrast and color
Smart Face Recognition + Face Tracking + Live Panorama
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung St68 Compact Digital Camera - 16.1mp - 5x Optical Zoom- Live Panorama - Pink
